data.title: William Doyle Mahan Obituary 2019
data.meta_description: Doyle Mahan, 63 of Vidor died Thursday, February 7th, 2019 at his residence. A native of Beaumont, TX, he was a longtime resident of Vidor. Doyle worked for AET Services in Galv...
data.text: Doyle Mahan, 63 of Vidor died Thursday, February 7th, 2019 at his residence. A native of Beaumont, TX, he was a longtime resident of Vidor. Doyle worked for AET Services in Galveston, TX for a while and was a carpenter. He enjoyed fishing and carpentry, but his true passion was reading. Doyle served his country in the US Army. Cremation arrangements were entrusted to Memorial Funeral Home of Vidor. A gathering for family and friends will be held at Benoit Louis Hall 3085 Hwy 12 in Vidor from 2:00 - 5:00 pm Sunday, February 17, 2019. Doyle is survived by his brothers Tony Mahan and his wife Beverly, Danny Mahan and his wife Julie, and sister Denise Mahan all of Vidor, TX. He is preceded in death by his parents Burt and Eton Mahan and brother John Michael Mahan.
